lead_paragraph: Here's an equation: 12 = 3. Twelve equals three. Hmm. Doesn't make sense. Can you fix it by adding a plus sign?.
snippet: We think of puzzles as individual pursuits, and they certainly were back when books ruled the earth. But now we have the Internet. We have another option. We can collaborate.
abstract: We think of puzzles as individual pursuits, and they certainly were back when books ruled the earth. But now we have the Internet. We have another option. We can collaborate.
